jdbc-user-service.users-by-username-query: select username, password, enabled from security_user where username = ?
jdbc-user-service.authorities-by-username-query: select u.username as username, a.name as authority from security_user as u left join security_user_authorities as ua on u.id = ua.user_id left join security_authority as a on a.id = ua.authority_id where u.username = ?
jdbc-user-service.group-authorities-by-username-query: select g.id as id, g.name as group_name, a.name as authroity from security_group as g left join security_group_users as gu on g.id = gu.group_id left join security_user as u on gu.user_id = u.id left join security_group_authorities as ga on ga.group_id = g.id left join security_authority as a on ga.authority_id = a.id where u.username = ?
